ProcessTemplates.Name: Copy multiple files from local fileshare to SFTP server
ProcessTemplates.Description: This Process will read all files from the fileshare that match the file mask, and move them without any processing to an SFTP location.
ProcessTemplates.ProcessVariablesJson: {"InFilePath":{"Value":"\"/example/\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Path of the files to be copied."},"InFileMask":{"Value":"\"*.*\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Mask for the files to be copied."},"TargetFilePath":{"Value":"\"/\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Target path where the files will be copied to."},"TargetServerAddress":{"Value":"\"example.org\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Target SFTP Server Address."},"TargetServerUser":{"Value":"\"user\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Target SFTP Server User."},"TargetServerPassword":{"Value":"\"password\"","IsSecret":true,"Mode":"text","Description":"Target SFTP Server User's Password."}}

Process.Name: Copy multiple files from local fileshare to SFTP server
Process.Description: This Process will read all files from the fileshare that match the file mask, and move them without any processing to an SFTP location.
